products.title: Modern Accent Chair
products.description: A vibrant upholstered accent chair for a stylish living space.
products.details: This modern accent chair brings a pop of color to your home. Upholstered in durable fabric with comfortable padding, it's perfect for reading nooks, bedrooms, or living spaces. Pair it with a small side table for a cozy setup.

products.title: Scandi Display Cabinet
products.description: Minimalist cabinet with open shelves and storage cubbies.
products.details: The Scandi display cabinet offers open shelves for display and hidden storage for organization. Crafted with clean lines and natural wood tones, it embodies Scandinavian minimalism, making it suitable for any modern home.

products.title: Black Sectional Sofa
products.description: Elegant L-shaped sectional with premium upholstery.
products.details: This black sectional sofa features plush cushions and a versatile L-shape design, making it the centerpiece of your living room. Its durable fabric and sturdy frame provide long-lasting comfort for gatherings and lounging.

products.title: Cozy Lounge Setup
products.description: Soft seating arrangement with coffee table and cushions.
products.details: Create a cozy lounge with this curated setup featuring a soft seating arrangement, coffee table, and accent cushions. Perfect for indoor relaxation or a stylish sunroom corner.

products.title: Wooden Coffee Table
products.description: Rustic oak table with sturdy legs and smooth finish.
products.details: This wooden coffee table is crafted from high-quality oak, featuring a rustic look and smooth finish. Its simple yet durable design makes it an excellent addition to both modern and classic interiors.

products.title: Mid-Century Armchair
products.description: Comfortable armchair with vintage flair and wooden frame.
products.details: The mid-century armchair blends comfort with a retro touch. Its wooden frame and soft cushions offer a perfect balance of durability and style, making it an ideal reading or lounge chair.

products.title: Modern Bedside Table
products.description: Compact bedside table with a drawer and lower shelf.
products.details: The modern bedside table combines practicality with style, featuring a drawer for essentials and a lower shelf for decor or books. Its sleek design complements contemporary bedrooms.

products.title: Scandinavian Dining Chair
products.description: Lightweight wooden chair with Scandinavian design.
products.details: The Scandinavian dining chair is lightweight yet sturdy, designed with clean lines and natural finishes. It pairs perfectly with wooden dining tables and brings a touch of Nordic charm to your dining room.

products.title: Contemporary Sideboard
products.description: Stylish sideboard with multiple storage compartments.
products.details: The contemporary sideboard is both stylish and functional, with ample storage space for tableware, electronics, or decor. Its sleek design makes it suitable for dining and living rooms alike.

products.title: Plush Ottoman
products.description: Comfortable plush ottoman that doubles as extra seating.
products.details: The plush ottoman offers versatile use as a footrest, coffee table alternative, or extra seating. Upholstered with soft fabric, it adds comfort and style to any living area.
